title: Higher education courses: find and apply

details.overview: Find and apply for a college or university course - full time, part time, post graduate, UCAS, Unistats, National Careers Service, Open University, CUKAS
details.body:
You can search and apply for most higher education courses online.

You can normally take higher education courses if you’re 18 or older. They’re usually taught in universities, colleges and specialist institutions such as art schools or agricultural colleges. You can get a broad range of qualifications, for example diplomas, bachelor degrees, foundation degrees and post-graduate degrees.

Full-time courses

National Careers Service - search for full-time and part-time courses.

UCAS - online application and search for full-time courses, or search directly with the college or university.

Unistats - compare official course data from universities and colleges, including student satisfaction and jobs after study.

Part-time courses

National Careers Service - search for full-time and part-time courses

Unistats - online search for part-time courses, apply directly to the college or university.

Open University courses

The Open University - online application and course search for distance learning.

Specialist music, dance and drama courses

CUKAS - online application and course search for music conservatoire courses.

Teacher training

The Teaching Agency - online application for teacher training.

Postgraduate courses

Prospects and Postgraduate Search - online searches for postgraduate study.

Courses at private institutions

Courses are also available at private institutions. Search and apply for these directly with the university or college. In some cases they can also be found on the UCAS website.
